title: Mobile Application Developer
jobDescription: Designs and Develops Mobile applications for Mobile Phones/Smartphones and other Mobile Devices by performing following duties: - Duties - Designs and Develops applications in Google Android Platform and related software development technologies such as Java - Interfaces or communicates with internal and external teams as needed for Project Reviews and to get required Technical Support for application feature interactions and connectivity - Performs Unit Testing - Documents code, participates in peer reviews, and works closely with QA to ensure flawless releases - Communicates and documents Project Status to the Project Manager Qualifications - Graduate/Post Graduate in Computer Science/Information Technology To perform this job successfully, an individual should demonstrate following competencies: - - Job Knowledge: Competent in required job skills and knowledge; exhibits ability to learn and apply new skills; keeps abreast; requires minimum supervision - Problem Solving: Identifies and resolves problems in a timely manner; gathers and analyses information skilfully; works well in group problem solving situations - Communications: Expresses ideas and thoughts verbally and in written form in Hindi and English; exhibits good listening and comprehension; keeps others adequately informed; selects and uses appropriate communication methods - Cooperation: Establishes and maintains effective relations; exhibits tact and consideration; offers assistance and support to other co-workers; works cooperatively in group situations; works actively to resolve conflicts - Oral Communication: Speaks clearly and persuasively in positively or negative situations; listens and gets clarification; responds well to questions; participates in meetings - Teamwork: Balances team and individual responsibilities; exhibits objectivity and openness to others views; contributes to building a positive team spirit; puts success of team above own interests; supports everyone efforts to succeed - Continuous Learning: Assesses own strength and weaknesses; seeks feedback to improve performance; pursues training and development opportunities; strives to continuously build knowledge; shares expertise with others.

title: Android/Ionic Developer
jobDescription:
MARTTALK TECHNOLOGIES PVT LTD. is looking for Android/Ionic Developer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Conceptualizing and formulating apps that are suitable for use on all types of Android devices.
  2. Implementing measures to safeguard users' data.
  3. Ensuring that the construction and presentation of your apps are congruent with the company's standards.
  4. Proofreading your code and correcting mistakes before each app is released.
  5. Collaborating with UI and UX Designers, as well as Software Testers, to ensure that each app is presentable and in perfect working order.
  6. Liaising with the marketing department to ensure consistency in our company's 'voice' across the board.
  7. Monitoring app reviews to detect areas for improvement.
  8. Creating app updates, including bug fixes and additional features, for release.

title: Mobile App Developer
jobDescription:
• Design and build Mobile applications using Hybrid/Native Mobile frameworks
  • Collaborate with cross functional teams for execution of new requirements.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency

Required Skill set

  • 6-8 years of experience building mobile applications with rich UI and great UX
  • Solid understanding of iOS Native, Swift/Objective-C, Android, Angular, VueJS, Cordova, Ionic framework.
  • Hands on experience in building hybrid and native mobile apps, web apps.
  • Hands on experience with iOS Native platform in Objective C/Swift.
  • Deep familiarity with Objective-C and Cocoa Touch
  • Experience working with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, Core Graphics and Core Text etc.
  • Hands on experience with Angular, Typescript, Ionic 3.0, Cordova framework.
  • Understanding of legacy JS frameworks and work experience at least one modern JS framework such as Vue JS, Angular js and React js
  • Candidate must have independently designed and developed mobile applications.
  • Experience on web service integration (SOAP, REST,JSON, XML).
  • Experience with version control (e.g. SVN, GIT).
  • Good understanding of HTML5, CSS3 , JavaScript.
  • Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.
  • Good understanding of the Android/iOS SDK.
  • Experience working in an agile environment.
  • Good to have experience in Aircraft Cabin Configuration applications .
  • Good to have Strong software development background in (FMS/Core Avionics/Airport Infra), iOS app development.

Basic Qualifications:

  • Education Qualification: BE/B-Tech/ME/M-Tech or any equivalent degree.
  • Experience: 6-8 yrs experience in building hybrid and native mobile apps.
  • Should be a Quick learner with excellent analytical skills
